code: import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const navigate=useNavigate();const animals=[{id:'cat',image:'./resource/cat.webp',name:'Cat'},{id:'dog',image:'./resource/dog.webp',name:'Dog'},{id:'fox',image:'./resource/fox.webp',name:'Fox'}];const handleAnimalClick=animalId=>{navigate(`/chat/${animalId}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Choose an Animal to Chat With"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"animals-grid",children:animals.map(animal=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"animal-card",onClick:()=>handleAnimalClick(animal.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:animal.image,alt:animal.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:animal.name})]},animal.id))})]});}export default Home;
